select lsi.* ,IFNULL(lc.comment_count,0) comment_count,IFNULL(lsale.sale_count,0) sale_count from t_store_info lsi left JOIN (select COUNT(1) comment_count,store_id comment_store_id from pms_comment GROUP BY store_id ) lc on lsi.id=lc.comment_store_id left JOIN (select sum(los.num) sale_count,lo.store_id order_store_id from oms_order lo,oms_order_sku los where los.order_id = lo.id and lo.store_id !=0 and lo.status in ('4','6','7') GROUP BY lo.store_id) lsale on lsi.id=lsale.order_store_id where lsi.status='2' and (lsi.store_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || lsi.business_scope like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by lsale.sale_count desc
order by lc.comment_count desc
limit #{startRowNum},#{pageSize}
